### {{< iconify devicon:r >}}{{< iconify fluent:arrow-swap-16-filled style="color:#276dc2;" >}}{{< iconify devicon:jupyter-wordmark >}}[lab]{.juplab}

::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%"}

::: {.callout-warning}

We ran into a scenario where {{< iconify devicon:jupyter-wordmark >}}[lab]{.juplab} "sees" {{< iconify devicon:r >}} but {{< iconify material-icon-theme:quarto >}} [**DOES NOT**]{.underline}. Many possible solutions identified by {{< iconify logos:github-copilot >}} & {{< iconify hugeicons:grok-02 style="color:#000000;" >}}, all aimed at making the {{< iconify devicon:r >}} kernel more easily findable -- the installation location matters (to {{< iconify material-icon-theme:quarto >}}, not {{< iconify devicon:jupyter-wordmark >}}[lab]{.juplab}). 
:::

:::

::: {.column width="3%"}
:::

::: {.column width="47%"}
1. open {{< iconify devicon:r >}} (not IDE)
2. install packages
3. run `installspec`

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| eval: false

install.packages(c("repr", "IRdisplay", "evaluate", "crayon", "pbdZMQ", "devtools", "uuid", "digest", "IRkernel"))

IRkernel::installspec(user = FALSE) #<1>
```
1. we [**DID NOT**]{.underline} specify `user = FALSE` -- additional recommendation is to access {{< iconify devicon:r >}} as admin (right--click before entering). This is *more likely* to place the {{< iconify devicon:r >}} kernel in an accessible location (to all programs).

:::

:::

## [Basic kable](https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/r-language/kable-method-in-r/)

```{r}
#| label: tbl-iris
#| tbl-cap: flowers <br> {{< iconify streamline-plump-color:potted-flower >}}
#| echo: fenced
#| output-location: column

knitr::kable(head(iris[1:3, ]), #<1>
      col.names=(c("sl", "sw", 
      "pl","pw","spec")))
```
1. object needs to be "square" {{< iconify line-md:confirm-square >}}

![](https://media1.giphy.com/media/v1.Y2lkPTc5MGI3NjExdDdnaTVrMHU3azU2dmpjbHF3enIxNnQ1bDk5Z2ttOWw0MXU4bDg5YSZlcD12MV9pbnRlcm5hbF9naWZfYnlfaWQmY3Q9Zw/A7XO2QsduJGrw6hKsU/giphy.gif){.absolute bottom="0" left="20"}
